attributes.action: ban all tasting on animals all over the world.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for animal testing laws in other countries. We could accept a petition about animal testing in the UK.

We currently have the following petitions open which you may wish to sign:

Bring into effect a ban on research & testing on dogs and cats in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618053

Ban the sale of cosmetic products that have been tested on animals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619585

You may be interested to know that there was a debate in Parliament on petitions about banning all animal testing in the UK in October 2021. You can find out more here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cdp-2021-0161/
